frontmatter.title: Roadmap
frontmatter.meta_title: FluxStore - Universal mobile commerce Flutter app for Magento, WooCommerce and Opencart
frontmatter.meta_description: Fluxstore is universal app that fully integration with the Woocommerce, Mangeto and Opencart

markdownRemark.html:
We will update the list of support feature and detail change logs for every update on this page

Available features:

v1.0

  • Full e-commerce features: Product variants, checkout process, order tracking, refund, order notes, wishlist, manage address.
  • Great UX design: multi-level categories, quick product filter, super smooth checkout flow, searching keyword history…
  • Flexible homepage config with Banner Slider, Banner Grouping, Flexible product column views.
  • User Profile which useful setting: push notification to turn on/off, get notification unread, view wishlist, order history, rate the app on app stores.
  • Social Logins by Facebook SDK.
  • Push notification (with notify history) via Firebase
  • Google Analytic via Firebase.
  • Easy to restyle and theming by on your branding sites.
  • Offline local caching.
  • Compatible with the latest Wordpress blogs.
  • Compatible with latest WooCommerce.
  • Compatible with latest Magento 2.x
  • Compatible with latest Opencart (with free Free Opencart API is included)
  • Easy registration by SMS Login by Facebook Account Kit
  • Instance synchronization from mobile to the server.
  • Perfect splash animation by using new Flare.
  • Working really well on both iOS and Android with support with 60 frames per second (fps).

Planning and backlog

v1.1

  • Full integrate with Magento
  • Full integrate with Opencart
